title: Hotel Room Review Full-Stack
desc: The first full-stack project I have worked on. This project taught me how to efficiently configure routes and APIs, as well as using asynchronous functions to fetch data to the user. Users can login (using their Google account, or any potential provider through Next-Auth) to post reviews, where they can be liked by other users, these reviews can also be deleted or edited through the author's dashboard. Hosted on Vercel.

title: Restaurant Menu
desc: A Front-end restaurant menu application made with NextJS, the dish data is stored in JSON and can be conditionally rendered using react components. This was my first project using NextJS.

title: Weather app
desc: Front-end project using React.js, data from the Weather API is fetched to display the current weather for a given location.

title: Google Clone
desc: This was one of the projects where I practiced my CSS skills by replicating a responsive Google search page.

title: Mint Sign-up Clone
desc: Another vanilla CSS replication project - a sign up form for creating a new account.

title: To do list Full-Stack
desc: To do list app from 'The Complete 2023 Web Development Bootcamp', database is hosted using MongoDB Atlas and the Express.js app hosted on Cyclic

title: Media Library
desc: A CRUD Front-end which stores entries about a user's media library/collection (i.e, books, movies, music). Made with React, Tailwind and localStorage.

title: This portfolio
desc: This portfolio was made using Next.js and SASS, I plan to update this portfolio as I go through my web development journey.
